General asdasd obj.shouldBe(other) General purpose assertion that the given obj and other are both equal expr.shouldBeTrue() Convenience assertion that the expression is true. Equivalent to expr.shouldBe(true) expr.shouldBeFalse() Convenience assertion that the expression is false.
